text: Duniya aur aakhirat kay umoor ko. Aur tujh say yateemon kay baray mein bhi sawal kertay hain aap keh dijiye kay inn ki khair khuwahi behtar hai tum agar inn ka maal apney maal mein mila bhi lo to woh tumharay bhai hain bad niyat aur nek niyat her aik ko Allah khoob janta hai aur agar Allah chahata to tumhen mushaqqat mein daal deta yaqeenan Allah Taalaa ghalbay wala hikmat wala hai
